NavigationPreloadManagerSetHeaderValue.summary:
The setHeaderValue() method of the interface sets the value of the {{HTTPHeader("Service-Worker-Navigation-Preload")}} header that will be sent with requests resulting from a operation made during service worker navigation preloading.
It returns an empty that resolves with undefined.

remarks.para:
The presence of the Service-Worker-Navigation-Preload header in preloading requests allows servers to configure the returned resource differently for preloading fetch requests than from normal fetch requests.
The default directive is set to true: this method allows the possibility of configuring multiple different responses to preload requests.

blockquote.para: Note: If a different response may result from setting this header, the server must set Vary: Service-Worker-Navigation-Preload to ensure that the different responses are cached.
